T02D3647:260b-1: a'arya mee tri ya s'a dha nam /
T02D3647:260b-3: 'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs rje btsun byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3647:260b-4: sngon du gsungs pa'i chogs stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
T02D3647:260b-5: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D3647:260b-10: dkar po'i zhal ni g-yas dang g-yon no //
T02D3647:260b-11: dbus kyi zhal gser gyi mdog can rab tu ser ba /
T02D3647:260b-12: phyag dang po gnyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa /
T02D3647:260b-13: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis mchog sbyin dang /
T02D3647:260b-14: klu shing gi me tog rgyas pa'i snye ma bsnams pa /
T02D3647:260b-15: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa'i gzugs can gyi byams pa mgon por bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3647:260b-16: khu tshur so sor bcings la /
T02D3647:260b-17: mdzub mo mthe bong gi dbus su bzhag pa me
T02D3647:260b-18: tog gi rnam par byas la de nas sngags bzlas
T02D3647:260b-19: par bya ste / aom mee mee tri mee tri ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3647:260b-20: 'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3647:260b-22: // / kha che'i pandi ta chen po sh'akya shr'i bzang pos mdzad pa'o ;
